DESCRIPTION: Creates an array of 1â€“3 dimensions. Index array elements with square brackets: [ ].
EXAMPLE: <h3>ArrayNew Example</h3> <!--- Create an array. ---> <cfset MyNewArray = ArrayNew(1)> <!--- ArrayToList does not function properly if the Array is not initialized with ArraySet ---> <cfset temp = ArraySet(MyNewArray, 1,6, "")> <!--- Set some elements. ---> <cfset MyNewArray[1] = "Sample Value"> <cfset MyNewArray[3] = "43"> <cfset MyNewArray[6] = "Another Value"> <!--- Is it an array? ---> <cfoutput> <p>Is this an array? #IsArray(MyNewArray)#</p> <p>It has #ArrayLen(MyNewArray)# elements.</p> <p>Contents: #ArrayToList(MyNewArray)#</p> <!--- The array has expanded dynamically to six elements with the use of ArraySet, even though we only set three values. ---> </cfoutput>

Parameter.DESCRIPTION: Number of dimensions in new array: 1, 2, or 3
